update LengthIntensity
runNO = #{runno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lengthIntensity = #{lengthintensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lightColor = #{lightcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lampType = #{lamptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

stopLampLength = #{stoplamplength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IATA = #{iata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
